uafcolors 1.0

UAF Colors

University of Alaska Fairbanks color schemes for R and Stata.

Colors from UAF Brand Guidelines.

R Package

Installation 

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rdazadda/UAF-color-scheme")

Usage 

library(uafcolors)

# All colors
barplot(1:12, col = uafcolors())

# Single color
hist(rnorm(100), col = uafcolors("blue"))

# ggplot2
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  scale_color_uaf() +
  theme_uaf()

See Basic Use for more examples.

Stata Scheme

Installation 

net install uaf, from("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/rdazadda/UAF-color-scheme/main/")

Usage 

set scheme uaf

sysuse auto, clear
scatter mpg weight
graph bar (mean) mpg, over(foreign)
histogram mpg

See Stata Usage for more examples.
